title: The Inflation Reduction Act is a Foot in the Door for Containing Health Care Costs
description: In this column for the JAMA Forum, KFF's Larry Levitt explores the Medicare drug-price negotiation provisions and other significant drug-price changes in the Inflation Reduction Act and their potential to lead to further efforts to address health care costs.

media:content.media:title: JAMA Forum The Inflation Reduction Act is a Foot in the Door for Containing Health Care Costs
